case.title: 22 year old girl looking for a boy from London - 22 (London)
case.text: Hello, i`m Lily 22/f/London redhead. I`m lookin for serious guys who know what they want. Tell me a little about yourself and I will do the same. Would like long term discreet relationship ;) Please be REAL and SANE and interested in same. I am very serious about this search. Hope to hear from you! Lily ;)
